Name: Chimaera
HPText: [HP] per player characters [MIN]. Heads each have 1/3 of its max HP, rounded up.

SetupTraits.Name: Chimaera Heads
SetupTraits.Description: To determine which heads the Chimaera has, roll a d10 3 times, reroll repeats, or pick 3.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The Chimaera flies 5 spaces. Characters under or adjacent to it when it lands are shoved 1 space and take fray damage as an area effect.

PhasesDescription: Each time the Chimaera loses a head, its phase changes. The recharge for its heads' abilities depend on phase, and only roll for a head's abilities on turns that it takes.

Phases.Name: Three Heads
Phases.Description: The recharges on all the head abilities are 6.

Phases.Name: Two Heads
Phases.Description: The recharges on all the head abilities are 4+.

Phases.Name: One Head
Phases.Description: The recharges on all the head abilities are 2+.

Actions.Name: Roar
Actions.Description: Adjacent characters take [fray] damage, are shoved 1 and become dazed. Dazed foes must save or become stunned.

Actions.Name: Headbutt
Actions.Effects: The Chimaera can dash 2 spaces before making this attack.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: The beast chooses a foe in range 2. At the end of that foe's next turn, the beast dashes up to 5 spaces towards that foe, phasing through characters. Characters the beast passes through are shoved 1 to either side and take [fray] damage. If the beasts ends this movement adjacent to their foe, that foe must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and become stunned, or [D]+[fray] only on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Toxic Bite
Actions.Effects: The character is marked. While marked, attacks from the Chimaera ignore vigor.

Actions.Name: Poison Spit
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 takes 2 damage and is poisoned. Poisoned characters take 4 damage.

Actions.Name: Poison Breath
Actions.Effects: All characters are poisoned. Poisoned characters are blinded.

Actions.Name: Tongue
Actions.Effects: The target is shoved 2 towards the chimaera.

Actions.Name: Swallow Whole
Actions.Description: An adjacent character must save or be swallowed whole. Remove them from the battlefield. At the start of their turn, the toad spits them out, placing them in any adjacent space to the chimaera's current location, then shoving them 3 spaces. They are winded.

Actions.Name: Inhale
Actions.Description: The next action this head takes increases all areas of effect by 1.

Actions.Name: Pyroclast
Actions.Description: Characters in the area must save or take [D] and become stunned. Summon a height 3 rock spire object in the area.

Actions.Name: Great Prowl
Actions.Description: The chimaera dashes 3 and gains stealth. It also gains evasion until it loses stealth.

Actions.Name: Shadow Breath
Actions.Effects: Characters in the area must save or become blinded.

Actions.Name: Cross Bolt
Actions.Effects: Attack target must save or become vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Polaris
Actions.Description: Mark a visible space. At the end of each turn past this one (foe or allied), roll a d6. On a 6, a meteor smashes into the space, inflicting [D]+[fray] and frostbite in a blast 1 area centered on the space to all characters within, then end this effect.

Actions.Name: Meteor
Actions.Description: All characters not in cover from the Chimaera must save or take fray damage twice and become vulnerable, or once on a successful save. Then, summon a height 1 boulder object adjacent to any character affected.

Actions.Name: Gaze
Actions.Description: Until the start of the Chicken's next turn, characters that attack the chicken or any of the other heads while the chicken is alive take +1 curse on their attacks. They can choose to take +1 boon instead but instead must save against petrification (see below).

Actions.Name: Petrification
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 becomes pacified. At the end of that character's next turn, they must save. On a failed save, they are encased in stone, removing them from the battlefield and becoming replaced with a destructible (10 hp) height 1 object. Until the is destroyed, they cannot take a turn. When it's destroyed, they are returned to the battlefield in the space they left and can take a turn as normal.

Actions.Name: Cold Feet
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 has an encasing of ice cover their feet, which is a summon sharing their space that can't move or be moved in any way. While encased, the targeted foe is immobile. These effects only end if the ice is destroyed. The ice can be destroyed by taking any amount of damage, and has 6 defense. Immobile foes take [D]+[fray] damage instead.

Actions.Name: Freezing Breath
Actions.Effects: Characters are inflicted with frostbite. Frostbitten characters take +[D]. Immobile characters are stunned.
